title: 服务器后台出现问题,求大家解决
author: qq1779077172
txt_content: 服务器后台出现     This crash report has been saved to: ./crash-reports/crash-2015-03-21_12.59.45-server.txt          请大家告知,要快呀,谢谢

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 这个是告诉你，你的服务器崩溃了 报错文件被保存到crash-report文件夹里面的crash-2015-03-21_12.59.45-server.txt
